overview: Three long-married couples in northern England discover that their marriages are in fact invalid, causing much re-evaluation and chaos. This was the fourth television film version made by the BBC of this comedy by J. B. Priestley. It featured several actors repeating their r√¥les from the earlier 1951 version including Frank Pettingell, Helena Pickard and Eileen Beldon.
title: When We Are Married
